title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Shape Effect Tummy Hold High Rise Boot Cut Jean Standard
description: STYLE - Beloved boot jean with tummy control panels, back pocket embroidery, zipper fly, belt loops and five functional pockets on a bootcut leg.
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashion forward to a novelty tee and all footwear from trendy shoes to your favorite flats.
LENGTH - This stylish stretch bootcut comes in a 32 inch inseam fron crotch to hem with a 18 inch leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.

Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Apparel; Shape effect tummy control boot cut jean gives you that wear confidence we all want whether your top is tucked in or not. The high rise waist sits at natural waistline with an easy to use front zipper fly and five fully functional pockets so you can run around with or without a handbag. This bootcut jean will go great with all your tops from fashion forward to a basic tee shirt as well as all footwear from strappy sandals and trendy heels to your favorite flats or boots. Available in assorted washes, see color name for specifics. - Goria Vanderbilt, Effortlessly fun and stylish. A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
